text: The Men's 200 metre backstroke competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 12 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !!
